description._content: Image Description from historic lecture booklet: "In methods of teaching much attention is given to memorizing lessons from books, without sufficient practical work. The "Project method" doesn't have the vogue in Japan that it has in the U.S." Original Collection: Visual Instruction Department Lantern Slides Item Number: P217:set 060 008 You can find this image by searching for the item number by clicking here.
